© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Contract Analytics leveraging Generative AI
1
Developed a Contract Analytics tool leveraging OpenAI GPT models to extract 
key insights and clauses, offering an intuitive and user-friendly interface to query 
directly on the contractual repository. This substantially reduces the time and 
effort spent by legal professionals on contract scrutiny, enhancing efficiency and 
overall productivity
(Multiple companies in Private Equity Firm Portfolio)

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Picture this…
You’re looking to develop a contract analytics tool by leveraging OpenAI GPT models, capable of analyzing contracts and 
enabling users to have interactive conversations based on the information present in the contracts. Currently, your portfolio  
companies deal with a large variety of customer contracts and price variations and the sales, finance and legal teams spend 
substantial amount of time in reviewing and understanding key themes, risks and deriving insights from them.
Private Equity first needs to build a OpenAI based contract 
analytics tool
2
Your value is enhanced. 
•
You have a contract analytics tool resulting in potential savings of ~$10M by reducing time spent on manual data 
interpretation, validation and scrutiny of complex clauses and strengthening data security with ring-fencing measures
•
You have achieved ~95% accuracy for contract related queries, streamlining decision making by providing reliable revenue and 
churn forecasting
•
You have also safely harnessed the power of generative AI in the daily workflows without concerns of security and data privacy
CONTRACT ANALYTICS LEVERAGING 
GENERATIVE AI
KEY RESULT   
•
~$10M potential saving
•
~965% accuracy for 
queries
VALUE LEVERS PULLED
•
App development
•
Document chunking 
optimization
•
Prompt engineering
•
Retrieval Augmented 
Generation
•
Data Extraction using 
OCR techniques
2
You turn to Accordion. 
We partner with your team to develop a contract analytics tool leveraging OpenAI GPT models to extract key insights and 
clauses, offering an intuitive and user-friendly, including:
1) Designing and developing an intuitive and user-friendly interface allowing direct queries on key insights and clauses on 
~1500 complex, multi-page contractual documents
2) Implementing OCR functionality leveraging Azure Document intelligence ensuring high-precision data extraction from 
scanned contracts
3) Deploying the platform securely on client’s Azure environment, with ring-fencing measures implemented to ensure data 
integrity and confidentiality
4) Enhancing response accuracy by optimizing context window, chunking size and Dynamic Top-K Tuning based RAG 
methodology
5) Implementing various features to engage users of the platform including searchable chat history, custom instructions, 
prompt guides, user feedback (like/dislike) and functionality to review response

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Accordion Value Add 
•
Designed and developed an intuitive and user-friendly interface allowing direct queries on key insights and clauses on ~1500 complex, multi-page contractual 
documents
•
Implemented OCR functionality leveraging Azure Document intelligence ensuring high-precision data extraction from scanned contracts
•
Deployed the platform securely on client’s Azure environment, with ring-fencing measures implemented to ensure data integrity and confidentiality
•
Enhanced response accuracy by optimizing context window, chunking size and Dynamic Top-K Tuning based RAG methodology
•
Implemented various features to engage users of the platform including searchable chat history, custom instructions, prompt guides, user feedback (like/dislike) 
and functionality to review response
Situation
•
Client’s portfolio companies deal with a large variety of customer contracts and price variations. The Sales, Finance and Legal teams spend substantial amount of 
time in reviewing and understanding key themes, risks and deriving insights from the contracts
•
Partnered with the client to develop a contract analytics tool by leveraging OpenAI GPT models, capable of analyzing contracts and enabling users to have 
interactive conversations based on the information present in the contracts.
Implementing Generative AI chatbot for contract analytics 
3
Impact
•
Contract Analytics tool resulted in potential savings of ~$10M by reducing time spent on manual data interpretation, validation and scrutiny of complex 
clauses and strengthening data security with ring-fencing measures
•
Achieved ~95% accuracy for contract related queries, streamlining decision making by providing reliable revenue and churn forecasting
•
Enabled the organization to safely harness the power of generative AI in their daily workflows without concerns of security and data privacy
CONTRACT ANALYTICS TOOL

1
Legal Analyst uploads contracts and send queries related to 
contracts for information retrieval into the web browser
2
Uploaded scanned contracts are sent to Azure AI Document 
Intelligence for text extraction
4
Vectorized query is passed to Milvus DB for vector search and 
returns relevant documents
5
Vectorized query along with documents are then sent to Azure 
OpenAI for generating response

Query Embeddings
User Query + Vector Documents

Query is sent to Azure OpenAI where they are vectorized based 
on LLM embeddings

© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
© 2024 Accordion     CONFIDENTIAL
Sample queries & AI generated response
USER ASKS QUESTION
GEN-AI GENERATED RESPONSE
• Does the renewal option for Company A specify that they 
can reduce the number of units in subsequent subscription?
✓Yes, the renewal option for Company A does specify that they can renew the subscription for any number of 
units of the Licensor Software set forth in the Order Form for an additional annual Subscription Term.
• Does the renewal option for Company A specify that they 
can cut down on number of units from the current 
subscription while renewing their subscription at the end of 
renewal term?
✓Yes, Company A  has the option to renew the subscription for any number of units of the Licensor Software set 
forth in the Order Form for an additional annual Subscription Term, regardless of the number of Named Users 
deployed prior to the renewal.
• What are the charges if Company B wants to renew their 
subscription with additional number of units at the end of 
subscription term?
✓If Company B wants to renew their subscription with additional number of units at the end of the subscription 
term, the annual Subscription Fee for each such renewal will be the result of multiplying (i) the Annual Renewal 
Fee per Unit set forth in Exhibit A of this Order Form for the Licensor Software being renewed by (ii) the 
corresponding Number of Units. The Annual Renewal Fee per Unit will increase by 2% per year over the prior 
year’s Annual Renewal Fee per Unit regardless of the Number of Units renewed.
• Does the renewal option for Company B specify that they 
can cut down on number of units from the current 
subscription while renewing their subscription at the end of 
renewal term
✓Yes, Company B  has the option to renew the subscription for any number of units of the Licensor Software set 
forth in the order form for up to 3 additional and consecutive annual Subscription Terms. If Veritas elects to 
renew a number of units of Licensor Software less than the number of units of Licensor Software set forth in 
Section 1 of the order form, then the annual renewal Subscription fee will be reduced.
• is there an automatic renewal of cloud services for 
Company B ?
✓No, there is no automatic renewal of cloud services for Company B . Following the end of the initial Term for the 
Subscription Software and Cloud Service, the Term will not renew unless renewed or extended by agreement in 
writing between the parties. 
5
ILLUSTRATIVE
